name: BUGBALL
description:
BUGBALL You are a basketball player playing in a stadium, and your fancy footwork has woken up the bugs dwelling in the ground underneath your feet. Just so you know, they're not happy. Jump around the court and swing from rope to rope to score as many hoops as possible while dodging the bugs and collecting powerups! (Note: You need to be using a PC or laptop to play this game. To play the game in fullscreen, please download it using the link below.) Controls Move - WASD keys Jump - Spacebar Climb up and down ropes - W and S keys Swing on ropes - A and D keys Aim throw - mouse cursor position Throw - Left Click Pause - Escape Feedback Enjoy the game, and please complete this survey after having a go.

https://tinyurl.com/y6jfts2y

You can also hang out and provide feedback in the game's discord: https://discord.gg/JmGJmZWW Donations This is my first game, created for an academic project. If you like the game, please consider donating to help continue development of the game! You can donate through the support button just underneath the game window or through the download button below. Credits This game was made by me (Alessandro Ciraolo). You can find me on Instagram: @alessandrociraolo. The art was created by Fabrizio Ciraolo. You can find him on Instagram: @fabs_animations.
